snippet: Several State Supreme Court justices expressed skepticism on Tuesday about a Republican official’s decision to keep the Democratic nominee for the United States Senate on the ballot against his wishes.
abstract: Several Kansas Supreme Court justices express skepticism about decision by Republican Secretary of State Kris Kobach to keep Democratic nominee for the United States Senate, Chad Taylor, on the ballot against his wishes after his withdrawal from the race.
lead_paragraph: Several State Supreme Court justices expressed skepticism on Tuesday about a Republican official’s decision to keep the Democratic nominee for the United States Senate on the ballot against his wishes.

headline.main: Kansas: Court Considers Fight Over Ballot
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Court Considers Fight Over Ballot
